    • UNKNOWN TITLE

    Plot Confusion Matrix

    plot_conf_matrix.Rd

    Generates a heatmap of the confusion matrix from actual and predicted labels.

    plot_conf_matrix(true_labels, predicted_labels, title = "Confusion Matrix")

    Arguments

    true_labels

    A factor vector of actual labels.

    predicted_labels

    A factor vector of predicted labels.

    title

    Optional title for the plot.

    Value

    A ggplot object representing the confusion matrix heatmap.

    Examples

    true <- factor(c("yes", "no", "yes", "no", "yes"))
predicted <- factor(c("yes", "no", "no", "no", "yes"))
plot_conf_matrix(true, predicted)
